Google Classroom Client

Classroom is a minimal software targeted towards Students of various levels in order to access course material and announcements by Course Administrators on-the-go.
All limitations of this app is beyond the developer of the software and it has been developed to make the most of the Classroom API.
The app was primarily created to make CourseWorks available offline in a nice user-interface.
This Application requires the Updated version of the Google Play Services.
Download it before filling a bug report
